data.actual_result: They disappear as if the channel was marked read
data.short_description: The new messages bar and the divider both disappear when the channel you're viewing has its name changed
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a friend (or use another device if you're lonely just like me) - Find or create a channel (s)he can manage - Make sure it has unread messages. If not, tell them to make some - Go to the channel - Watch the new messages bar and the red divider - Tell them to change the name
